#BlackMagicCraft #Episode200

Big thanks to LOOT for sponsoring this video! If you want to check them out and sign up, head on over to their site: https://bit.ly/38xTqdb
Get in before the end of the month to get your supply of amazing undead models and graveyard goodies!

Alright, it's time to paint my first 75mm "miniature". In this episode I complete the zombie man for this sweet little cemetery diorama. I utilized UV resin and Citadel Contrast paints to doo some sick blood and bodily fluid effects on his entrails. Yum!

title: I discovered a technique that made me love mini painting!
